title: Erratum: Chromatin-associated degradation is defined by UBXN-3/FAF1 to safeguard DNA replication fork progression.

This Article contains errors in the labelling of Fig. 5 and Supplementary Fig. 6, the former of which was introduced during the production process. In Fig. 5b, an ‘x' indicating the presence of UBXN-3(SGG)-HIS in lane 6 was inadvertently omitted. In Supplementary Fig. 6g, the fourth bar from the left should have been labelled as ‘siFAF1 3′UTR #2+HA-FAF1'. The correct version of both figures appear below. Figure 5: Supplementary Figure 6:
